Neologism installation manual.

= Introduction =

In this manual you can find a detailed manual about how to install Neologism in your own server.

= Before =

Here a list of things that you will need to install Neologism:
  * [http://drupal.org/ Drupal] and all [http://drupal.org/requirements its requirements]:
    * HTTP Server (such as Apache)
    * PHP support
    * DB support (such as MySQL)
